description: When executing a program, an error occurs when attempting to clear the list of objects stored in a variable. The format of the list is not recognized, causing the clear command to fail.
code:
# Create a list of objects 
my_list = ["apple", "banana", "strawberry"]

# Attempt to clear the list
my_list.clear() 

# This will cause an error since the list format is not recognized
my_
